title: The bugs in this patch
body:
So this thread is going to be about the bugs I've encountered so far in this patch, If I didn't mention any that you guys might've encountered feel free to comment about it.
_**The CDR Bug**_
Instead of items that are on cooldown (Trinket's, Active items etc) being greyed out, they keep their colour and only show the CDR line. This is very deceptive, especially when you upgrade your yellow trinket to a Greater Stealth Totem. As this makes it look like you always have a charge up. 
_**The Mute Bug**_
So I just encountered this in a game I played, When I muted a person it said "User is now being ignored." And my chat disappeared, It also bugs sometimes when you mute someone and it says "User has been unmuted." when really they should be muted.
**Some notable mentions**
These aren't entirely bugs, but they can be a nuisance.
-When playing Elise, it seems that the smart move system doesn't know whether to walk to the wall and Venomous Bite over it or walk around and use it. Although this doesnt happen all the time, It can cause you to get stuck in the wall while the smart move system decides which route is quicker.
Although this was a short forum post, I hope it was a helpful one in pointing out some of the bugs/nuisances in this patch.
